nodes.bodyText:
Is that even used ever for web ? At a quick glance it seems Microsoft specific
EDIT: answering myself to myself: as favicon
Wasn't the vaadin favicon an .ico file in the old framework versions? I'm so used to that file ending kinda, that's why I'm asking :)

Favicon is still often an ico file, but it is set as a link with the rel=icon" attaribute so it doesn't go through css.
@rolfsmeds how common would it be to use a .ico in css?
Extremely rare. Safe to ignore I'd say..
Sorry for the noise, ignoring is 👍 - I missed the obvious comment above the list of file endings.. 🤦‍♂️
